76 void MmwDemo_edmaInit(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
77 {
78  uint8_t edmaNumInstances, inst;
79  int32_t errorCode;
80 
81  edmaNumInstances = EDMA_getNumInstances();
82  for (inst = 0; inst < edmaNumInstances; inst++)
83  {
84  errorCode = EDMA_init(inst);
85  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
86  {
87  System_printf ("Debug: EDMA instance %d initialization returned error %d\n", errorCode);
88  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
89  return;
90  }
91  //System_printf ("Debug: EDMA instance %d has been initialized\n", inst);
92  }
93 
94  memset(&obj->EDMA_errorInfo, 0, sizeof(obj->EDMA_errorInfo));
95  memset(&obj->EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo, 0, sizeof(obj->EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo));
96 }
97 
105 void MmwDemo_EDMA_errorCallbackFxn(EDMA_Handle handle, EDMA_errorInfo_t *errorInfo)
106 {
107  gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.EDMA_errorInfo = *errorInfo;
108  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
109 }
110 
118 void MmwDemo_EDMA_transferControllerErrorCallbackFxn(EDMA_Handle handle,
119  EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo_t *errorInfo)
120 {
121  gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo = *errorInfo;
122  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
123 }

136 void MmwDemo_checkEdmaErrors(uint8_t edmaInstanceId)
137 {
138  int32_t errCode;
139  bool isAnyError;
140  MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj;
141  uint8_t idx = edmaInstanceId;
142 
143  obj = &gMmwMCB.dataPathObj;
144 
145  if (obj->isPollEdmaError[idx] == true)
146  {
147  errCode = EDMA_getErrorStatus(gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.edmaHandle[idx], &isAnyError, &obj->EDMA_errorInfo);
148  if (errCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
149  {
150  System_printf("Error: EDMA_getErrorStatus() failed with error code = %d\n", errCode);
151  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
152  }
153 
154  if (isAnyError == true)
155  {
156  System_printf("EDMA channel controller has errors, see gMssMCB.EDMA_errorInfo\n");
157  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
158  }
159  }
160 
161  if (obj->isPollEdmaTransferControllerError[idx] == true)
162  {
163  uint8_t tc;
164 
165  for(tc = 0; tc < obj->numEdmaEventQueues[idx]; tc++)
166  {
167  errCode = EDMA_getTransferControllerErrorStatus(obj->edmaHandle[idx], tc,
168  &isAnyError, &obj->EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo);
169  if (errCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
170  {
171  System_printf("Error: EDMA_getTransferControllerErrorStatus() failed with error code = %d\n", errCode);
172  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
173  }
174 
175  if (isAnyError == true)
176  {
177  System_printf("EDMA Transfer Controller instance %d has errors, see gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo\n", tc);
178  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
179  }
180  }
181  }
182 }
183 
189 void MmwDemo_hwaOpen(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj, SOC_Handle socHandle)
190 {
191  int32_t errCode;
192 
193  /* Open the HWA Instance */
194  obj->hwaHandle = HWA_open(0, socHandle, &errCode);
195  if (obj->hwaHandle == NULL)
196  {
197  System_printf("Error: Unable to open the HWA Instance err:%d\n",errCode);
198  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
199  return;
200  }
201  //System_printf("Debug: HWA Instance %p has been opened successfully\n", obj->hwaHandle);
202 }
203 
209 void MmwDemo_hwaClose(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
210 {
211  int32_t errCode;
212 
213  /* Close the HWA Instance */
214  errCode = HWA_close(obj->hwaHandle);
215  if (errCode != 0)
216  {
217  System_printf("Error: Unable to close the HWA Instance err:%d\n",errCode);
218  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
219  return;
220  }
221  //System_printf("Debug: HWA Instance %p has been closed successfully\n", obj->hwaHandle);
222 }
223 
229 void MmwDemo_edmaOpen(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
230 {
231  int32_t errCode;
232  EDMA_instanceInfo_t edmaInstanceInfo;
233  EDMA_errorConfig_t errorConfig;
234  int32_t edmaCCIdx;
235  uint8_t tc;
236 
237  for (edmaCCIdx = 0; edmaCCIdx < EDMA_NUM_CC; edmaCCIdx++)
238  {
239  obj->edmaHandle[edmaCCIdx] = EDMA_open(edmaCCIdx, &errCode, &edmaInstanceInfo);
240  obj->numEdmaEventQueues[edmaCCIdx] = edmaInstanceInfo.numEventQueues;
241 
242  if (obj->edmaHandle[edmaCCIdx] == NULL)
243  {
244  System_printf("Error: Unable to open the EDMA Instance err:%d\n",errCode);
245  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
246  return;
247  }
248  //System_printf("Debug: EDMA Instance %p has been opened successfully\n", obj->edmaHandle);
249 
250  errorConfig.isConfigAllEventQueues = true;
251  errorConfig.isConfigAllTransferControllers = true;
252  errorConfig.isEventQueueThresholdingEnabled = true;
253  errorConfig.eventQueueThreshold = EDMA_EVENT_QUEUE_THRESHOLD_MAX;
254  errorConfig.isEnableAllTransferControllerErrors = true;
255 
256  obj->isPollEdmaError[edmaCCIdx] = false;
257  if (edmaInstanceInfo.isErrorInterruptConnected == true)
258  {
259  errorConfig.callbackFxn = MmwDemo_EDMA_errorCallbackFxn;
260  }
261  else
262  {
263  errorConfig.callbackFxn = NULL;
264  obj->isPollEdmaError[edmaCCIdx] = true;
265  }
266 
267  obj->isPollEdmaTransferControllerError[edmaCCIdx] = false;
268  errorConfig.transferControllerCallbackFxn = MmwDemo_EDMA_transferControllerErrorCallbackFxn;
269 
270  for(tc = 0; tc < edmaInstanceInfo.numEventQueues; tc++)
271  {
272  if (edmaInstanceInfo.isTransferControllerErrorInterruptConnected[tc] == false)
273  {
274  errorConfig.transferControllerCallbackFxn = NULL;
275  obj->isPollEdmaTransferControllerError[edmaCCIdx] = true;
276  break;
277  }
278  }
279 
280  if ((errCode = EDMA_configErrorMonitoring(obj->edmaHandle[edmaCCIdx], &errorConfig)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
281  {
282  //System_printf("Error: EDMA_configErrorMonitoring() failed with errorCode = %d\n", errCode);
283  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
284  return;
285  }
286  }
287 }
288 
294 void MmwDemo_edmaClose(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
295 {
296  EDMA_close(obj->edmaHandle);
297 }
